# Resources

## Github

Github is add-on service, supporting the use of the distributed
version control system Git.

For a crash course, see:

- [Getting started with GitHub](https://docs.github.com/en/get-started)


For recommendations on organizing a project, see:

- [Template repository](https://github.com/INITIALISE-EU-project/template)



## CSC

Finnish IT Center for Science provides computing resources for the project. For more information, see:

- [CSC](https://www.csc.fi/)
